conversation.message: That is an incredibly thoughtful and important question, Parent A. Ensuring a smooth, stress-free transition is paramount to us, as it sets the foundation for a child's successful time here. Our approach is highly personalized. We begin with a scheduled 'settling-in' period, which involves short, gradual visits with a parent present, increasing in duration over several days or even weeks, depending entirely on the child’s needs. We assign a dedicated key worker before the child starts, who focuses solely on building trust and familiarity with the new student and their family, acting as the main point of contact. We prioritize open communication during this time, viewing it as a true partnership with you. Does the idea of a flexible, child-led settling period align with what you are looking for?
